NeuroConnect

Support hub for autistic expats and family

About us

NeuroConnect offers support and resources tailored to autistic individuals and their loved ones living abroad. Whether you're navigating a new healthcare system or seeking a sense of community, we're here to help.

Our services

We offer a variety of services to support autistic expats and their families:

  • Free guidance by our dedicated volunteers.
  • Support groups led by certified coaches.
  • Workshops about the Dutch medical system.
Explore our services

Our events

Our events are a great way to connect with others in a safe and welcoming space. Join us for:

  • Book Clubs
  • Nature Walks
  • Game Nights
  • Day Trips
Explore our events
